name: Tanelia Matthews
text: Every single visit always results in me sitting for extended periods of time even with an established appointment time. I think that it’s highly inconsiderate to not respect the patients’ time. Patients are often told to reschedule if they are more than 15 minutes late. How about if you are not called back within 15 minutes of your scheduled appointment time, then patients reschedule for the office to receive their insurance/self-pay money??? There needs to be a better strategy to the scheduling of this facility, so that every patient receives the appropriate care while having their time respected, as well. Everyone does not have 3+ hours of time to sit and wait for a simple doctor’s appointment.

name: Lauren Grzegorczyk
text:
Currently sitting in the parking lot, waiting for a phone appointment with PA Tammie Smith so I can refill important medication. Over an hour and a half ago during my check in, I was told there were 2 people ahead of me. 45 minutes past my appointment time, I’m told there is still 1 person ahead of me. My appointment time was at 1:40, and it is now past 3pm with still no phone call. These phone conferences have never taken more than 5-10 minutes.

I’ve  been coming here for two years, and it’s been absolutely god awful. Never have I been to a Clinic that is this consistency unprofessional, doesn’t pick up the phone half the time, and can easily have you waiting to be seen for up to 2hours, sometimes more. Always severely understaffed as well, which makes me feel bad for the few employees there that are actually kind and decent. If it were not for sliding scale, I would never come back. If you have insurance, avoid this place at all costs. Seriously.

Update: Finally had my phone conference and PA Tammie Smith was rude per usual! Shouldn’t expect anything more from a doctor with multiple 1 star reviews on webmd though, right?

name: cesar ibarra
text: We love our pediatrician at Huntsville Family Health Center.  Dr. Xavier is very thorough and has gone the extra mile when caring for my child- time and time again.  I feel at ease putting the care of my child in Dr. Xavier's hands.  Dr. Xavier listens to me, addresses my concerns, and asks the right questions.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with him and will continue to see him for all of my pediatric needs.

resp.text: Hi Cesar, thank you for your review.  At Huntsville Family Health Center, we strive for excellence in caring for our patients.  We will relay the positive words you shared about Doctor Niraj Xavier with the team.  Thank you for continuing to make us your preferred choice!

name: Michelle Robison
text: Get to appt on time yet always have an hour or more wait before getting called to the back and then still sit in the room longer waiting for the Dr.

name: Chad Chaney
text: Very helpful everytime I go . My wifes diabetic meds costs almost $4000.00 everywhere and here it costs under 100.00

resp.text: Hello Mr. Chaney, thank you for your review about the helpfulness of our team at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will certainly pass your comments along.

name: Tara Caputo
text: I love Dr. Kurecki and his office staff. He is easy to talk to and really listens! He has a lot of great advice, and I am not waiting 2 weeks to see him. He also has a very diverse background and a lot of medical knowledge. 10/10 recommend if you are looking for a family doc!

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Caputo. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We'll be sure to pass your comments along to our Huntsville Family Health Center team.

name: Sharon Murph
text: The NP was unfriendly, rushing and didn’t listen to my complaints. I want Dr. Lisabeth Williams back!!!

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Murph. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Please consider calling us at (855) 724-7325 so that we can directly address this. Thank you.

name: Nina Thomas
text: Joel is awesome I wish the rest of the staff was like him. He assisted us in ten minutes we had the results we’ve been trying to receive for 21 days no one ever answered the phone so we had to drive to the health center

resp.text: Hi Nina.  Thank you for your feedback.  It will be shared with our leadership team.

name: Sadie Lynch
text: Always a warm welcome doctor Williams is the best

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us here at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will pass your comments along to our team!

name: Jeanette Torres
text: The dr don’t know what they doing. They don’t really pay attention to what you want to say. The place is not sanitized right.im very unhappy with everything.

resp.text: Hi Jeanette Torres.   It is disappointing to learn that your experience was not positive, and we would like to get more details.  Please reach out to Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you again for taking the time to reach out to us, and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kelley Cornelius
text: This office was absolutely laughable. The worst experience I have ever had at a physician's office.  They scheduled an MRI I arrive at the appointment to be sent away due to the fact that this office did not have the correct orders written.  Reschedule for the following week and again incorrect orders.  Mind you the place where I was having the MRI done also called multiple times and even physically went to this office to try to get things done.  Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We are disappointed to hear of your negative experience with us.  Your review will be provided to our leadership team for addressing.  In the meantime, please call Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you.

name: Madison Lowry
text: dr love does not listen and will talk over you. he is very rude and also likes to joke on you at your own expense. his nurses were phenomenal though and they’re the only reason HFHC isn’t getting 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Madison.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We will share your feedback with our leadership team.  In the meantime, please consider calling our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234.

name: Sherry Black
text:
I am pretty sure it depends on who your doctor is, but... I never have to wait long when I go to my doctor! Rather I have an appointment or they are working me in, it is NEVER a long wait!
Dr Kurecki is my doctor & I think highly of him! I am very confident putting my health in his hands!

name: Matt Nieves
text: If it wasn't for how nice the doctor was w me I would've said 0 staff is very not proffesional and rude, the lady in the laboratory thinks she can treat everybody however she wants which not very proffesional I would not recommend this place

resp.text: Hello Matt.  Thank you for bringing this matter up to our attention.   Although you had a positive interaction with the doctor, we are disappointed to learn of your entire experience.  Please call our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234 so that we can properly document your concern.  Thank you.

name: noella hall
text: My husband has been going to Dr Kurecki for some time now. He has always been at ease and all issues discussed, we absolutely love him.

name: Tea Raine
text: I went my first time and was happy to get help. Staff was nice and caring.

name: Cheria Moore
text: The staff on the first floor were amazing and very polite! On the second floor the nurse practitioner was rude, displayed unprofessional behavior and I will not be returning to this clinic!

name: Rebecca Louthan
text: The staff is very unprofessional and rude. I have never in my life been treated so poorly before.

name: Airi Ventura
text: My partner spent over $60 round trip to get help for his medical issues here, waited for over two hours, and then got told that there's nothing he could do about it. No referrals to any specialists, nothing. Don't go here unless you have no other choice.

name: Deanna Resler
text: Best I've had in a long time really cared and got me the right refferal needed for my gallbladder surgery I will defaintly be back for future sickness

text: Worst doctors office I've ever been to PLEASE DO DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME I had a appointment at 1pm waited two hrs! Still didn't see the doctor if I could give it a negative star I would

text:
Waited over 2 hours. I've never seen the Dr. It's always his nurse. Tried to call his answering service to cancel my appointment and the lady said she didn't even have my Dr's name in her computer.

name: Latasha Rodgers
text: Got to the front door yeah

name: Joi Ford
text: LONG wait while the employee took her 45 minute lunch. Mind you the lunch hours posted are 12-1 and this was at 1:45. She LOCKED THE DOOR! Clients kept knocking.  People with appointments could not get in!  She was by herself. I get that you have to eat, but as nurse I haven’t received a lunch break many times! You eat quickly and keep moving! The lab closed at 3:30!

name: Austin Hart (SmartFishing)
text: Appointment at 9, got there 8:45. It’s after 10 and still haven’t been seen. People lined up in the hallway. Understaffed and unprofessional. Get with it Labcorp. People have other things to do than wait until it’s convenient for you to do your jobs. Update: Waited 4 hours and was never seen!

name: Brandy Taylor
text: Worst lab experience ever. I am shocked that this place is still in business. Very unprofessional staff.  First clue should have been what lab runs out of collection tubes needed for common laboratory testing?!?! Do yourself a favor and go to another laboratory.

name: Sean
text: I had as lovely of an experience as you can expect from a blood draw.  Tons of CORONA safety measures in place and each staff I interacted with was extremely pleasant.  Labcorp was efficient and painless (always a nice bonus)

name: Josiah Radcliffe
text: Hours of operation show they are open til 3pm but when you arrive there is a paper sign on the door that says they are closed from 12-1pm for lunch. So frustrating after making the 45 minute drive and arriving at 12:10pm!

name: Elizabeth Taylor
text: This is the worst place I've ever tried to contact. I took my 1 year old to get his labs done (he has epilepsy and other disabilities so this is crucial for dosage regulation). They did great with handling how rough everything went to getting his blood. But a week later the office in Harvest, AL called me after hours and didn't have a message. I tried calling back immediately but they didn't answer. Days later, I contact his doctor and they never faxed over his results. The doctor office and I have both been trying to call the office for days and they won't answer the phone. I even called right when they opened several times today and nothing. This is absurd. You should never ignore the phone if you have the ability to answer and I STILL need the results. I will never recommend this office or any LabCorp to any friends or family members.

name: Stacey
text: Make an appointment on line and  they have highly skilled phlebotomists.  Never had a problem and Naomi ROCKS!  Thank you!

name: Philip Hahn
text: I get it, no one likes having their arm stabbed, but I have never had problems with this location. Wait times seem reasonable, checkin is streamlined, and it's convenient to where I live. Staff are nice and do good work.

name: Annette Charles
text: This place sucks. Very short staffed. Extremely slow. Patient care is none.... Do  not recommend this place. My Doctor suggested another office. Should have went to the other one... I have no clue what they are doing.

name: Linda Shawley
text: They are always friendly and helpful

name: Emily Ford
text: Great people. Was in and out in probably 15 minutes for a urine test. Very nice ladies there

name: Levi Griffin
text:
I went in for blood work, and the staff I encountered were friendly and professional. I did not have an appointment, but they were able to see me right away.

Drawing blood from me can be difficult, but the nurse was able to do it quickly with minimal discomfort on my part.

I have read the negative reviews of this establishment and can say that I did not encounter any of the problems they reported. It seems the issues with unfriendly staff have been corrected.

If I need any further blood work done, then I won't hesitate to return here for it.

name: James Shipma
text: Terrible customer service. Tried to access my results online: had to make an account, OK I can do that. After creating my account, I was told that my information was incorrect. It was not. After THAT I re-entered the correct information and then the system said the information couldn't be validated and I had 30 days to resolve my account (?)... I called my local location and I got a machine telling me the address and office hours, and if I needed help getting my results online, to go to the login portal where all this mess started. I need these results to begin my job and it's taken far too long. Very disappointed.

name: apps apps
text: Service is terrible here. If you have a choice go to HH lab

name: Lily Jaiswal
text: Very slow. Not open for lunch

name: Bob Birmingham
text: Used them many times. Never had a problem getting blood drawn.

name: Aaron Lussi
text: What a useless business. How are you going to schedule someone during your lunch break and make them sit and wait for an hour, cause everyone leaves. Why isn't there an option for 0 stars?

name: Sharon Webber
text: My experience at this office for a simple drug test was horrendous.  The woman working there, Donna Bourdeau, was extremely unprofessional, uncaring, and rude to my children and me.  She refused to allow my daughters to sit in the lobby while I was in the restroom (a total of about 3 minutes for the entire drug test including paperwork), though there was no one else even in the office.  She was aggressive, curt, and downright mean.  Do NOT go to this office if you have children or prefer not to deal with a woman such as this.

name: Google User
text: Will never use this LabCorp again. Doctor ordered some extensive tests. Had to go by the lab to pick up supplies and collection instructions.  Not only did the woman at the front mess up one of my tests, but she offered very unprofessional and unsolicited opinions about my testing. Have written a formal complaint letter, but after reading all the negative reviews about LabCorp, I doubt anyone in the company will give a hoot. This woman at the Jeff Rd location needs to leave the medical field immediately, and flip burgers for a living.  She is completely inept, unprofessional, and unable to maintain an acceptable level of discretion and maturity required for this job.  I will never step foot in this location again even though my Dr's office is directly across the hall. Thankfully, I took my tests to HH labs where they caught the fact that LabCorp messed up one of the tests. Will only go to HH for any future tests.

name: James Stubblefield
text: Very un profesional. I had to get a drug test required for admissions to one of my classes. THe two ladies that were there were very unprofessional!! They kept arguing back and forth when I told the lady at the window I was ready for the test, She yelled at the top of her lungs YOUR DRUG TEST IS READY! and there were people in the waiting room! And the ladies cell phone kept ringing!! I will report to Calhoun that they need to find someone else to do the drug panels!!

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: This place isn’t staffed adequately enough for the volume they receive. Appointments are merely suggestions. I was seen >30 min after my scheduled appointment time. Staff was very apologetic.

name: Franceska Wackmann
text: There's no need to make an appointment, because even when you do they will still take the walk ins. Despite the fact they knew there was an appointment coming in. I asked how long it will take before she got to me,  she responded she "doesn't know, there are two ahead of me."  I looked at the clip board,  the "two ahead of me" didn't have an appointment.  Meanwhile I came on my lunch break.

name: AU Link
text: Very unprofessional,  they did not want me to be there when they opened up

name: Kara Davenport
text: Wait was well over an hour. Only one employee working. Terrible service and experience.

text: There's no need to make an appointment, because even when you do they will still take the walk ins. Despite the fact they knew there was an appointment coming in. I asked how long it will take before she got to me,  she responded she "doesn't know, there are two ahead of me."  I looked at the clip board,  the "two ahead of me" didn't have an appointment.  Meanwhile I came on my lunch break.

name: AU Link
text: Very unprofessional,  they did not want me to be there when they opened up

name: Kara Davenport
text: Wait was well over an hour. Only one employee working. Terrible service and experience.

name: Tanelia Matthews
text: Every single visit always results in me sitting for extended periods of time even with an established appointment time. I think that it’s highly inconsiderate to not respect the patients’ time. Patients are often told to reschedule if they are more than 15 minutes late. How about if you are not called back within 15 minutes of your scheduled appointment time, then patients reschedule for the office to receive their insurance/self-pay money??? There needs to be a better strategy to the scheduling of this facility, so that every patient receives the appropriate care while having their time respected, as well. Everyone does not have 3+ hours of time to sit and wait for a simple doctor’s appointment.

name: Lauren Grzegorczyk
text:
Currently sitting in the parking lot, waiting for a phone appointment with PA Tammie Smith so I can refill important medication. Over an hour and a half ago during my check in, I was told there were 2 people ahead of me. 45 minutes past my appointment time, I’m told there is still 1 person ahead of me. My appointment time was at 1:40, and it is now past 3pm with still no phone call. These phone conferences have never taken more than 5-10 minutes.

I’ve  been coming here for two years, and it’s been absolutely god awful. Never have I been to a Clinic that is this consistency unprofessional, doesn’t pick up the phone half the time, and can easily have you waiting to be seen for up to 2hours, sometimes more. Always severely understaffed as well, which makes me feel bad for the few employees there that are actually kind and decent. If it were not for sliding scale, I would never come back. If you have insurance, avoid this place at all costs. Seriously.

Update: Finally had my phone conference and PA Tammie Smith was rude per usual! Shouldn’t expect anything more from a doctor with multiple 1 star reviews on webmd though, right?

name: cesar ibarra
text: We love our pediatrician at Huntsville Family Health Center.  Dr. Xavier is very thorough and has gone the extra mile when caring for my child- time and time again.  I feel at ease putting the care of my child in Dr. Xavier's hands.  Dr. Xavier listens to me, addresses my concerns, and asks the right questions.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with him and will continue to see him for all of my pediatric needs.

resp.text: Hi Cesar, thank you for your review.  At Huntsville Family Health Center, we strive for excellence in caring for our patients.  We will relay the positive words you shared about Doctor Niraj Xavier with the team.  Thank you for continuing to make us your preferred choice!

name: Michelle Robison
text: Get to appt on time yet always have an hour or more wait before getting called to the back and then still sit in the room longer waiting for the Dr.

name: Chad Chaney
text: Very helpful everytime I go . My wifes diabetic meds costs almost $4000.00 everywhere and here it costs under 100.00

resp.text: Hello Mr. Chaney, thank you for your review about the helpfulness of our team at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will certainly pass your comments along.

name: Tara Caputo
text: I love Dr. Kurecki and his office staff. He is easy to talk to and really listens! He has a lot of great advice, and I am not waiting 2 weeks to see him. He also has a very diverse background and a lot of medical knowledge. 10/10 recommend if you are looking for a family doc!

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Caputo. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We'll be sure to pass your comments along to our Huntsville Family Health Center team.

name: Sharon Murph
text: The NP was unfriendly, rushing and didn’t listen to my complaints. I want Dr. Lisabeth Williams back!!!

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Murph. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Please consider calling us at (855) 724-7325 so that we can directly address this. Thank you.

name: Nina Thomas
text: Joel is awesome I wish the rest of the staff was like him. He assisted us in ten minutes we had the results we’ve been trying to receive for 21 days no one ever answered the phone so we had to drive to the health center

resp.text: Hi Nina.  Thank you for your feedback.  It will be shared with our leadership team.

name: Sadie Lynch
text: Always a warm welcome doctor Williams is the best

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us here at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will pass your comments along to our team!

name: Jeanette Torres
text: The dr don’t know what they doing. They don’t really pay attention to what you want to say. The place is not sanitized right.im very unhappy with everything.

resp.text: Hi Jeanette Torres.   It is disappointing to learn that your experience was not positive, and we would like to get more details.  Please reach out to Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you again for taking the time to reach out to us, and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kelley Cornelius
text: This office was absolutely laughable. The worst experience I have ever had at a physician's office.  They scheduled an MRI I arrive at the appointment to be sent away due to the fact that this office did not have the correct orders written.  Reschedule for the following week and again incorrect orders.  Mind you the place where I was having the MRI done also called multiple times and even physically went to this office to try to get things done.  Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We are disappointed to hear of your negative experience with us.  Your review will be provided to our leadership team for addressing.  In the meantime, please call Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you.

name: Madison Lowry
text: dr love does not listen and will talk over you. he is very rude and also likes to joke on you at your own expense. his nurses were phenomenal though and they’re the only reason HFHC isn’t getting 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Madison.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We will share your feedback with our leadership team.  In the meantime, please consider calling our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234.

name: Sherry Black
text:
I am pretty sure it depends on who your doctor is, but... I never have to wait long when I go to my doctor! Rather I have an appointment or they are working me in, it is NEVER a long wait!
Dr Kurecki is my doctor & I think highly of him! I am very confident putting my health in his hands!

name: Matt Nieves
text: If it wasn't for how nice the doctor was w me I would've said 0 staff is very not proffesional and rude, the lady in the laboratory thinks she can treat everybody however she wants which not very proffesional I would not recommend this place

resp.text: Hello Matt.  Thank you for bringing this matter up to our attention.   Although you had a positive interaction with the doctor, we are disappointed to learn of your entire experience.  Please call our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234 so that we can properly document your concern.  Thank you.

name: noella hall
text: My husband has been going to Dr Kurecki for some time now. He has always been at ease and all issues discussed, we absolutely love him.

name: Tea Raine
text: I went my first time and was happy to get help. Staff was nice and caring.

name: Cheria Moore
text: The staff on the first floor were amazing and very polite! On the second floor the nurse practitioner was rude, displayed unprofessional behavior and I will not be returning to this clinic!

text: The staff is very unprofessional and rude. I have never in my life been treated so poorly before.

name: Latasha Rodgers
text: Got to the front door yeah

name: Joi Ford
text: LONG wait while the employee took her 45 minute lunch. Mind you the lunch hours posted are 12-1 and this was at 1:45. She LOCKED THE DOOR! Clients kept knocking.  People with appointments could not get in!  She was by herself. I get that you have to eat, but as nurse I haven’t received a lunch break many times! You eat quickly and keep moving! The lab closed at 3:30!

name: Austin Hart (SmartFishing)
text: Appointment at 9, got there 8:45. It’s after 10 and still haven’t been seen. People lined up in the hallway. Understaffed and unprofessional. Get with it Labcorp. People have other things to do than wait until it’s convenient for you to do your jobs. Update: Waited 4 hours and was never seen!

name: Brandy Taylor
text: Worst lab experience ever. I am shocked that this place is still in business. Very unprofessional staff.  First clue should have been what lab runs out of collection tubes needed for common laboratory testing?!?! Do yourself a favor and go to another laboratory.

name: Sean
text: I had as lovely of an experience as you can expect from a blood draw.  Tons of CORONA safety measures in place and each staff I interacted with was extremely pleasant.  Labcorp was efficient and painless (always a nice bonus)

name: Josiah Radcliffe
text: Hours of operation show they are open til 3pm but when you arrive there is a paper sign on the door that says they are closed from 12-1pm for lunch. So frustrating after making the 45 minute drive and arriving at 12:10pm!

name: Elizabeth Taylor
text: This is the worst place I've ever tried to contact. I took my 1 year old to get his labs done (he has epilepsy and other disabilities so this is crucial for dosage regulation). They did great with handling how rough everything went to getting his blood. But a week later the office in Harvest, AL called me after hours and didn't have a message. I tried calling back immediately but they didn't answer. Days later, I contact his doctor and they never faxed over his results. The doctor office and I have both been trying to call the office for days and they won't answer the phone. I even called right when they opened several times today and nothing. This is absurd. You should never ignore the phone if you have the ability to answer and I STILL need the results. I will never recommend this office or any LabCorp to any friends or family members.

name: Stacey
text: Make an appointment on line and  they have highly skilled phlebotomists.  Never had a problem and Naomi ROCKS!  Thank you!

name: Philip Hahn
text: I get it, no one likes having their arm stabbed, but I have never had problems with this location. Wait times seem reasonable, checkin is streamlined, and it's convenient to where I live. Staff are nice and do good work.

name: Annette Charles
text: This place sucks. Very short staffed. Extremely slow. Patient care is none.... Do  not recommend this place. My Doctor suggested another office. Should have went to the other one... I have no clue what they are doing.

name: Linda Shawley
text: They are always friendly and helpful

name: Emily Ford
text: Great people. Was in and out in probably 15 minutes for a urine test. Very nice ladies there

name: Levi Griffin
text:
I went in for blood work, and the staff I encountered were friendly and professional. I did not have an appointment, but they were able to see me right away.

Drawing blood from me can be difficult, but the nurse was able to do it quickly with minimal discomfort on my part.

I have read the negative reviews of this establishment and can say that I did not encounter any of the problems they reported. It seems the issues with unfriendly staff have been corrected.

If I need any further blood work done, then I won't hesitate to return here for it.

name: James Shipma
text: Terrible customer service. Tried to access my results online: had to make an account, OK I can do that. After creating my account, I was told that my information was incorrect. It was not. After THAT I re-entered the correct information and then the system said the information couldn't be validated and I had 30 days to resolve my account (?)... I called my local location and I got a machine telling me the address and office hours, and if I needed help getting my results online, to go to the login portal where all this mess started. I need these results to begin my job and it's taken far too long. Very disappointed.

name: apps apps
text: Service is terrible here. If you have a choice go to HH lab

name: Lily Jaiswal
text: Very slow. Not open for lunch

name: Bob Birmingham
text: Used them many times. Never had a problem getting blood drawn.

name: Aaron Lussi
text: What a useless business. How are you going to schedule someone during your lunch break and make them sit and wait for an hour, cause everyone leaves. Why isn't there an option for 0 stars?

name: Sharon Webber
text: My experience at this office for a simple drug test was horrendous.  The woman working there, Donna Bourdeau, was extremely unprofessional, uncaring, and rude to my children and me.  She refused to allow my daughters to sit in the lobby while I was in the restroom (a total of about 3 minutes for the entire drug test including paperwork), though there was no one else even in the office.  She was aggressive, curt, and downright mean.  Do NOT go to this office if you have children or prefer not to deal with a woman such as this.

name: Google User
text: Will never use this LabCorp again. Doctor ordered some extensive tests. Had to go by the lab to pick up supplies and collection instructions.  Not only did the woman at the front mess up one of my tests, but she offered very unprofessional and unsolicited opinions about my testing. Have written a formal complaint letter, but after reading all the negative reviews about LabCorp, I doubt anyone in the company will give a hoot. This woman at the Jeff Rd location needs to leave the medical field immediately, and flip burgers for a living.  She is completely inept, unprofessional, and unable to maintain an acceptable level of discretion and maturity required for this job.  I will never step foot in this location again even though my Dr's office is directly across the hall. Thankfully, I took my tests to HH labs where they caught the fact that LabCorp messed up one of the tests. Will only go to HH for any future tests.

name: James Stubblefield
text: Very un profesional. I had to get a drug test required for admissions to one of my classes. THe two ladies that were there were very unprofessional!! They kept arguing back and forth when I told the lady at the window I was ready for the test, She yelled at the top of her lungs YOUR DRUG TEST IS READY! and there were people in the waiting room! And the ladies cell phone kept ringing!! I will report to Calhoun that they need to find someone else to do the drug panels!!

text: Very un profesional. I had to get a drug test required for admissions to one of my classes. THe two ladies that were there were very unprofessional!! They kept arguing back and forth when I told the lady at the window I was ready for the test, She yelled at the top of her lungs YOUR DRUG TEST IS READY! and there were people in the waiting room! And the ladies cell phone kept ringing!! I will report to Calhoun that they need to find someone else to do the drug panels!!

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: This place isn’t staffed adequately enough for the volume they receive. Appointments are merely suggestions. I was seen >30 min after my scheduled appointment time. Staff was very apologetic.

text: There's no need to make an appointment, because even when you do they will still take the walk ins. Despite the fact they knew there was an appointment coming in. I asked how long it will take before she got to me,  she responded she "doesn't know, there are two ahead of me."  I looked at the clip board,  the "two ahead of me" didn't have an appointment.  Meanwhile I came on my lunch break.

name: AU Link
text: Very unprofessional,  they did not want me to be there when they opened up

name: Pablo Meza Duran

name: william whitaker
text: Nice Doctors and staff

name: Brittany Brashaw
text: The staff are nice but this place is SO slow. Even when you have an appt they take awhile.

resp.text: Hi Brittany- We apologize if we have not met your expectations and thank you for bringing this to our attention.

name: Brandee Laughlin
text: Drove 45 minutes to do a drug screen and as of April they (the office)changed there hours of doing them until 2pm instead of 3:30 which is what the website says and drug screen order.  No help from employees and very inconsiderate.  I along with the other 10 that use this location for our drugs will not be back. We will use Labcorp.

resp.text: We apologize for any disappointment this may have caused, Brandee, and thank you for taking the time to share this feedback with us. Your review will be forwarded to our leadership team to address with our staff. We've verified that the details for this location, including the correct hours of operation for drug screenings, are available on our website at https://appointment.questdiagnostics.com/patient/confirmation. Please contact our Patient Advocacy team with additional details so we can address any concerns directly: 610-454-6075 or patientadvocacy@questdiagnostics.com.

name: Mila speed
text: Great customer service. The employees are nice and very professional. Especially Victoria I was so nervous but she very comforting. Very clean as well.

name: Kalli Webb
text: Went here a while ago for a routine drug screen for my job at the time. I had never taken a drug screen before and the lab tech was super rude. She was rude at the desk and because they didn't ask me prior if I was on medication I almost lost my job! Don't go here!

name: Katie Clearman
text: Very quick, efficient, and professional. Get here before 3:30 if you’re getting a drug test, that’s the cut off time

name: Kenneshia Davis
text: Victoria is wonderful! Great customer service, fast, and friendly!

name: Karey Hughey
text: Victoria is extremely rude!!! We were there for our wellness screening for our insurance and she was very very rude to both of us the entire time.

name: Morgie
text: Haven’t used their services, but one of their couriers came inches from hitting me while cutting me off in traffic. I think the car number was 33440

name: Kimberly Rossler
text: Nobody is at the front desk ever !! The first visit they lost my orders so I was prepared to bring my orders in this visit . Horrible… I even made an appointment but yet have been sitting here for an hour. This location is just sad, always has been but my doctor called orders into this location.

name: Joy Glenn
text:
First of all when you enter the office, absolutely NO instructions or a human being to instruct patients to use the kiosk to sign in. We waited FOR OVER ONE HOUR to get lab drawn. Every one that came in went back while we waited and waited. FINALLY  we were called back by the ABSOLUTE RUDEST human being on this earth!  My daughter which is very sick and afraid wanted me to accompany her....the lab tech asked her if she really needed me, from then on her attitude was worse and worse.  After my daughter told her she was a hard stick due to little veins, boy, she took that to heart. Another tech came in and we finally left.
Yesterday, we received a call that there wasn't enough blood so we were told to go ahead and go down there they will be waiting. MIND YOU we were under the assumption they closed at 5 p.m. due to what we were told the last time we were there. we arrived at 3:55 p.m. we went in and the SAME rude lab tech which NEVER told us at that time they were closing. EVERYTHING we TRIED to ask she cut us off in the most condescending tone and was ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS!
.

name: Charlene Smith
text: Aisha Gilmore was my technician today. She was absolutely fabulous! Not only was she friendly and professional, she was so gentle that I never felt the needle. I didn't even realize we were done. Thank you, Aisha, for making this a quick and easy experience.

name: Christopher Peters
text: Angela provided top notch customer service. I appreciate it!

name: Scott Knowles
text: Went this morning & had the best experience you could have when takin' a drug test. Very friendly staff who did a great job getting me in & out quick as possible!! Very satisfied!!!

name: Nolan Crowe
text: I had to get blood work done today, the lady who helped me,  her name is Angela. Quick and friendly.  Didn't feel when she drew the blood.  Recommend this place.

name: Rhonda Allen
text: I choose the location on Montlimar because of the EXCELLENT service provided by the ladies at this location. They try their best to give you a Great experience. Aisha is very cordial, helpful and makes sure my orders are processed correctly. Angela is virtually as painless as it gets for a very sensitive me. She takes the fear out of getting lab work done. 😀Her kindness flows as well.

name: mickey swaboda
text: They hang up on you multiple times if you try making a appointment

name: Summer Davis
text: Went in to do a drug test today. I waked in and was immediately told to check in at the kiosk. Once I went back to do the test the directions the woman gave me were said very quickly and were mumbled. I thought I heard 30, so I assumed I needed to fill the cup up to the 30 line. I came back and she asked me (with an attitude) if I knew I was supposed to be doing a drug test today and did I not have to use the restroom. I told her I thought it was enough and She told me with an attitude again that it was supposed to be up to the 45 line. The only reason I’m giving two stars is after I told her that she rushed through the directions she SORT OF apologized and said she does it so much a day she goes quickly. I understand she does this all day, but you’re dealing with people. Some of these people have never done a drug test before or it has been a fairly long time. It needs to be done with less of an attitude. I shouldn’t walk out feeling stupid or like I was taking up her time when she’s paid to do this.

name: Laura Christian
text: Aisha was great and got us in quickly and made the experience painless even with our two kids in tow.

name: Perry Reed
text: This was an amazing place. Got there right when they opened and was literally out in 10 mins. The young lady who helped me was sweet and very good at what she does. Wished I could remember her name but either way amazing job. It's people like you that make things like this easier to deal with.

name: Todd Phillips
text:
The ladies at this office were Wonderful!! Aisha was very nice and had a Great personality!!  I was their less than 45 minutes. I hope they can get more help so they can answering alot faster.
RTR!!!!

text: Get skipped and wait for hours

I heard “ Well, there is one, two, three, four people ahead of you. “ I can count. I don’t know how long it takes for each patient. So, before I even go back, they’re getting 1 Star. They shouldn’t get that.

text: Rushed, but thorough and accurate. Just wish they didn't rush people so much.

text: Told me the bill would be $100, sent me a bill for $300.

name: Lorraine Price
text: My landlord needed to go to the hospital because he couldn't breathe due to his congestive heart failure. He tried DCH, but ended up sitting in the ER for hours. I told him to come home and wait until early morning the next day to try again. He got up the next morning and went to Hale County Hospital instead. It was a far better choice. He was put in a room right away and even though they came in every two hours for something, he had his needs cared for and was well-fed. They actually made appointments for him and wrote out prescriptions. He was happier with their service than with any of the services he received from DCH in the past few years. The staff were kind and respectful. It made up for the robots that DCH hires and lack of compassion the nurses and doctors  exhibit.

name: Nailah Corliss Olufemi
text: My mother has been admitted to this hospital several times and they provided her with excellent care to. I would recommend it!

name: Rebekah Turner
text: Very good especially this young lady name Jamie she brightens up your day!!

name: Lindsey Rhynes
text: This hospital is AWFUL!  It is run down, none of the equipment worked, the doctor was rude, and when they tried to give my son an antibiotic injection, they sliced his leg open with the needle.  Not to mention when we gave our insurance info, they didnt even file to the insurance company, but instead billed us EVERY WEEK, and when we called to debate, they DID NOT CARE.  Even had an insurance rep call and speak to the billing office, and they were obnxious to my insurance company.  BEWARE!!!!    MAKE SURE THEY BILL YOUR INSURANCE!!!  BAD, BAD, BAD FOR BUSINESS.

name: E3
text: The fees paid for services rendered are astronomical. The one star goes to the professionalism of the technician Paul G.

resp.text:
Dear Sir or Madam,
We have researched into your review and we don’t have anyone here employed by that name.
Regards,
Madison Core Labs

name: Clarissa Harrold
text: Breonna did my blood draw and did an awesome job... She was friendly, patient and confident with what she was doing.. Easiest blood draw I've ever had. Added bonus my doctor had the results the next day..

name: Sandra G
text: I called to this lab and specifically asked if they did the test I was ordered to and they said yes. When I went the day after they told me they don't do that test, so I wasted my time and I had to book an appointment somewhere else. This test was time specific, so I had to do it that specific day, their misinformation ruined the integrity of that study. I don't recommend this place at all.

resp.text:
Dear Sandra,
We apologize for any confusion that occurred. If you would e-mail us at info@madisoncorelabs and who you spoke with so we may get this corrected.

Regards,
Madison Core Labs

name: Judy Dunlap
text: Their person doing blood labs have trouble every time my husband and I go. She actually when through my vein and my arm was black and green for 3 weeks. They can never find my husband's vein and this last time she used both arms and he still bruised.

name: Exanna Gerald
text: I can't give a lower review so one star will have to do! This corporation was used by a urology department that I used in my area, however I was unaware that they were using this corporation. Having said that, They sent me a bill, that was over a year past due, which I had no knowledge that was still outstanding. We then sent them a Bill Pay check immediately, they stated that they never received it. We then sent them a copy of the Bill Pay check to their email address. We then contacted them again to see if they received it, they said they had not. We then went to the Bank and had them send a copy of the cancelled Bill Pay check. We called and they said there was not enough information on the back of the check to prove that they had received it, but that they would write the bill off. We were told that there are multiple businesses in this building that could have deposited our check. My QUESTION is this if you are so big that you can't send out a Statement in a reasonable amount of time and your company doesn't have the ability to deposit Bill Pay checks into the right accounts,  then maybe your company is too big to do good business and would be better off splitting into a smaller organization that can perform it's services in a more timely and accurate manor!

resp.text: Our billing department is always willing to work with patient bills and flexible payment options. Please ask to speak with a supervisor to regarding your issue.

name: Woodard Family
text: Madison Core lead my primary care provider to believe that they were in network with United health Care while completing my  Lab work when they actually weren't. I was unaware who was doing my labs at the time. Labs would have been covered had they not  went to them, now I owe them money and they refuse to budge on the price.

resp.text: Dear Patient, We have flexible payment options and are always willing to work with patients on payment plans.

name: Christopher Chin

Here's the kicker, I wait 2 weeks for the reading at my Dr., they never received the results from Tyler!! Now i have to wait LONGER, with pain for them to track down why and where they are!!!

text:
I went here a urine screen and was initially treated great by a young man that took my sample and acted professionally.
Unfortunately upon calling a week or so later was greeted by a very unhappy, frankly rude female receptionist. I asked if there was a result for my test and she then mocked me saying, “If didn’t pay for the screen then they own my urine” (laughing in condescending tone).
I understand that these offices have no incentive to treat their patients with respect because companies usually pay for their services; however, it was unusual to be treated disrespectfully out of the blue by a stranger that was probably having a bad day.
Good luck if you are an employee having to deal with this company. 👎🏽👎🏽

Was advised that they were to be issuing me a refund to call them to go pick it up and was treated horribly as if I had done something wrong. The lady who answered the phone had a nasty attitude and talked sassy to me. I don’t recommend this facility nor would I ever visit here again.
